title: TikTok Shop Partner (TSP)
content:
# What is TikTok Shop Partner (TSP) Ôºü TikTok Shop Partners (TSPs) offer a range of services to sellers, including operational mentoring, content creation, and shop management, enabling sellers to scale their businesses on TikTok Shop effectively. Click to learn more about [TSP service categories](64f1989064ed2e0295f3c1b5#TSP) # What are the benefits of becoming a TSP on TikTok ShopÔºü **New Leads** * Have the opportunity to be recommended to suitable sellers and brands **Service Market Discovery** * Increase your visibility as sellers discover your services in the App & Service Store. **Rewards and Incentives** * Take advantage of various incentive policies, including financial rewards and traffic. **Training and Development** * Participate in regular training and partner development programs to accelerate your business growth **Custom Services** * High-performing TikTok Shop Partners receive personalized one-to-one support from our partner operations team. # How does Partner Center support TSP? ‚ú® Partner Center serves as a central hub for partners to efficiently manage their business operations. Explore these essential product features designed to streamline your day-to-day activities. ## Workflow for TSP on Partner Center ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/3e839887d7c241c9acd496d5708005ad~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ## Partner Center Feature Guide for TSPs | | Action | Product Module | Market | Guides | | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | | 1 | Create a service | Partner Console >> Service and App | US,UK,ID,MY,VN,TH,PH,SG | [Create and publish your service](64f198a193f5dc028e35505f)
[Listing your service on the App & Service Store](650411a75a12ff0294023d30) | | 2 | Authorize the service | Seller Center >> App and Service Store | | [Seller service authorization steps](64f198a9dc7f3e028d38171a) | | 3 | Manage the Service | Partner Console >> Seller Management | | [Check and manage your service](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/PP2ndKmNDoLejyx8Yoec9L2RnFS) | | 4 | View seller's shop data | Partner Console >> Data Compass | | [„ÄêTSP US„ÄëTTSPC Data Compass Playbook](658280c3f48fbe02df73ee0a)
[„ÄêTSP SEA+UK„ÄëTTSPC Data Compass Playbook](https://bytedance.feishu.cn/docx/RCVqdhfA4o0qTLxCZNpc2UeJnjb#G0mUdMKSMocUWQxEHnSc6R22nMg) |
